## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install netatmo_thermostat in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure netatmo_thermostat package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to netatmo_thermostat
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/kafkasl/netatmo-thermostat):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/kafkasl/netatmo-thermostat.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/kafkasl/netatmo-thermostat)

``` sh
$ conda install -c kafkasl netatmo_thermostat
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/netatmo-thermostat/)

``` sh
$ pip install netatmo_thermostat
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/kafkasl/netatmo-thermostat)’s
[pages](https://kafkasl.github.io/netatmo-thermostat/). Additionally you
can find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/kafkasl/netatmo-thermostat) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/netatmo-thermostat/) respectively.
